properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 8:12PM EST until February 9 at 3:07AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Yellow River near Conyers below Milstead affecting Newton and
Rockdale Counties

Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Bibb...Houston...Jones...
Monroe and Twiggs Counties

Tucsawhatchee Creek near Hawkinsville affecting Pulaski County


...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Towaliga River near Juliette affecting Monroe County

Ocmulgee River near Dames Ferry affecting Jones and Monroe
Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tucsawhatchee Creek near Hawkinsville.
* Until late Saturday night.
* At 7 PM Friday the stage was 12.9 feet...and rising.
* Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast to continue.
* Flood stage is 11 feet.
* The river will continue rising to near 13.2 feet by after Saturday
morning. The river will fall below flood stage late Saturday
evening.
* At 13 feet...Minor flooding continues in the woodlands...fields
and pastures upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia
Highways 257 and 27.
